description.value:
Your grimoire gains a new page that can hold a single spell from a different tradition than your patron's. This works like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-feats.Item.02PahoRKHQCcnJlC]{Expanded Arcana} except the highest rank of spell you can copy is three ranks lower than the highest rank you can invoke.
    Special You can take this feat multiple times. Each time, your grimoire gains an additional page that you can copy a spell to.
